description: {"blocks":[{"key":"at9s7","text":"The protocols here described are related to the sections presented in Figure 1B focusing on the practical activity performed by the students. All the steps are presented and critically commented when deemed useful. The reagents used during the preparation of these protocols are indicated as just an example, as all the reagents can be purchased from any company.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journal.name: PLOS One
journal.citation: Gasparello J, Papi C, Zurlo M, Cosenza LC, Breveglieri G, et al. (2022) Teaching during COVID-19 pandemic in practical laboratory classes of applied biochemistry and pharmacology: A validated fast and simple protocol for detection of SARS-CoV-2 Spike sequences. PLOS ONE 17(4): e0266419. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0266419

manuscript_citation: Gasparello J, Papi C, Zurlo M, Cosenza LC, Breveglieri G, et al. (2022) Teaching during COVID-19 pandemic in practical laboratory classes of applied biochemistry and pharmacology: A validated fast and simple protocol for detection of SARS-CoV-2 Spike sequences. materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"93tf9","text":"(a) Agarose powder. High purity biotechnology grade agarose (Norgen Biotek Corp, Thorold, Ontario, Canada);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3931s","text":"(b) Tris Acetate EDTA (TAE) 50X. TAE 50X (2 M Tris-base, 1 M acetic acid, 50 mM EDTA disodium salt) was prepared as follow: weigh 242 grams of Tris-base (MW=121.14 g/mol); dissolve Tris-base in 500 ml of deionized water; add, under a chemical hood 57.1 ml s of acetic acid; add 100 ml of 0.5 M EDTA pH 8.0; adjust the volume to a final volume of 1 L. All starting reagents were from Sigma-Aldrich (St.Louis, Missouri, USA);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4v3td","text":"(c) Nuclease free water;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27cmi","text":"(d) Tartrazine or other tracking dye (Sigma-Aldrich, St.Louis, Missouri, USA);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu3b5","text":"(e) Deionized water;","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8926q","text":"(f) FluoroVue Nucleic Acid Gel Stain 10.000x (SMOBIO Technology, Sinchu City,Taiwan, ROC);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvn5b","text":"(g) Orange Loading Dye 6X (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Walthman, Massachusetts, USA);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":26},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":7},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":17}],"data":{}},{"key":"63uno","text":"(h) GeneRuler 1 kb DNA Ladder (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Walthman, Massachusetts, USA), as molecular weight marker for ‘nucleic acid (RNA or DNA) samples’ (optional, we do not use it in our experience) or GeneRuler 50 bp DNA Ladder (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Walthman, Massachusetts, USA) for PCR product molecular weight marker (see 2.1 point);","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ei2j","text":"(i) Unknown sample (more detailed information are provided in supplementary methods for laboratory experience organizers). In any case, the concentration of (i) the pCMV3-Spike-GFPSpark plasmid should be to about 300 ng/µl in our case (we recommended to load not less than 500 ng) and (ii) RNA extracted from A549 and Spike-plasmid transfected A549 cells, also in this case we used 300 ng/µl of RNA. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sn0e","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6054C81EAB6011EC9B530A58A9FEAC02","url":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6054C866AB6011EC9B530A58A9FEAC02","url":null}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6054C88EAB6011EC9B530A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}
